name: R_O-Bots
description:
Bomberman insipred local multiplayer

Game start: maybe future single player

Battle start: start local multiplayer

Options: crt filter on/off

WASD/Controller left stick/d-pad input: movement

ENTER: UI accept

BACKSPACE: UI back

UI accept to change scenes

UI accept on BATTLE START menu to start multiplayer

Key O/Gamepad Right face button: Place Bomb

Gamepad1=Player1

Gamepad2=Player2
